sourcesContent:
<template>
    <ManageAlbumCreate></ManageAlbumCreate>
    <b-tab title="消息管理" active  v-if="renderComponent">
        <b-row>
            <b-col md="3">
                <b-list-group v-for="(item,index) in albums" :key="index">
                    <b-list-group-item active v-if="index == editing.current" @click="select(index)">
                        <b-badge>{{ item.id }}</b-badge>
                        {{ item.name }}
                    </b-list-group-item>
                    <b-list-group-item v-if="index != editing.current" @click="select(index)">
                        <b-badge>{{ item.id }}</b-badge>
                        {{ item.name }}
                    </b-list-group-item>
                </b-list-group>
            </b-col>
            <b-col md="9">
                <b-row class="my-2">
                    <b-col md="2">
                        <label for="">相簿編號</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="10">
                        <b-form-input v-model="editing.data.id" placeholder="Enter your name" disabled></b-form-input>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>
                <b-row class="my-2">
                    <b-col md="2">
                        <label for="">相簿名稱</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="10">
                        <b-form-input v-model="editing.data.name" placeholder="Enter your name"></b-form-input>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>
                <b-row class="my-2">
                    <b-col md="2">
                        <label for="">內文</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="10">
                        <ckeditor v-model="editing.data.context" :config="editorConfig" :editor="editor"></ckeditor>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>
                <b-row class="my-2">
                    <b-col md="2">
                        <label for="">說明</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="10">
                        <ckeditor v-model="editing.data.description" :config="editorConfig" :editor="editor"></ckeditor>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>
                <b-row class="my-2">
                    <b-col md="2">
                        <label for="">建立時間</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="10">
                        <b-form-input disabled v-model="editing.data.created_at" placeholder="Enter your name"></b-form-input>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>
                <b-row class="my-2">
                    <b-col md="2">
                        <label for="">更新時間</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="10">
                        <b-form-input disabled v-model="editing.data.updated_at" placeholder="Enter your name"></b-form-input>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>
                <b-row class="my-2">
                    <b-col md="2">
                        <label for="">圖片</label>
                    </b-col>
                    <b-col md="10">
                        <b-row>
                            <b-col md="4 text-center mt-2" v-for="item in photos" :key="item.id">
                                <b-card :img-src="'http://localhost/ntcust_lang_backend/storage/app/' + item.file.path" 
                                img-alt="Image" 
                                img-top>
                                    <b-button v-if="editing.data.cover.id == item.id" @click="coverFile(item.id)" variant="info m-2">目前封面</b-button>
                                    <b-button v-else @click="coverFile(item.id)" variant="outline-info m-2">設為封面</b-button>
                                    
                                    <b-button @click="deleteFile(item.id)" variant="danger m-2">刪除</b-button>
                                    <template #footer>更新於{{ moment(item.updated_at).format("YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM") }}</template>
                                </b-card>
                            </b-col>
                        </b-row>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>
                <b-row>
                    <b-col md="12 text-center">
                        <b-button variant="success m-2" @click="updateData(editing.data.id)">更新</b-button>
                        <b-button variant="danger m-2" @click="deleteData(editing.data.id)">刪除</b-button>
                    </b-col>
                </b-row>    
            </b-col>
        </b-row>
    </b-tab>
</template>

<script>
import moment from 'moment'
import ManageAlbumCreate from '../components/Manage-Album-Create.vue';
import { AlbumServer, FileServer } from '../../providers/http-server';
import ClassicEditor from '@ckeditor/ckeditor5-build-classic';
import MyUploadAdapter from '../../libs/myUploadAdapter';

function MyCustomUploadAdapterPlugin(editor) {
    editor.plugins.get('FileRepository').createUploadAdapter = (loader) => new MyUploadAdapter(loader);
}

export default {
    name: 'App',
    components: {
        ManageAlbumCreate
    },
    data(){
        return {
            renderComponent: true,
            albums: [],
            editing: {
                current: 0,
                data: [],
            },
            changeSelect: false,
            photos: [],
            editor: ClassicEditor,
            editorConfig: {
                extraPlugins: [MyCustomUploadAdapterPlugin],
            }
        }
    },
    created(){
        this.moment = moment;
        AlbumServer.readALL({all: true}).then(
            (response) => {
                // console.log(response)
                this.albums = response.data;
                this.editing.data = this.albums[0];
                this.editing.current = 0;
                FileServer.filter(5, this.editing.data.id).then(
                    (res) => this.photos = res.data
                );
            }
        );
    },
    methods: {
        updateData(id){
            AlbumServer.update(id, this.editing.data).then(
                // (response) => console.log(response)
            );
        },
        deleteData(id){
            AlbumServer.delete(id).then(
                // (response) => console.log(response)
            );
            // this.$router.go(0);
        },
        select(num){
            this.editing.current = num;
            this.editing.data = this.albums[num];
            FileServer.filter(5, this.editing.data.id).then(
                (res) => this.photos = res.data
            );
        },
        deleteFile(id) {
            FileServer.delete(id).then(
                // (response) => console.log(response)
            );
        },
        coverFile(id) {
            let data = {
                cover_file: id
            };
            AlbumServer.update(this.editing.data.id, data).then(
                // (res) => console.log(res)
            );
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style scoped></style>
